# Content Strategy

## Quick Start

This skill helps you develop data-driven content strategies and editorial calendars. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Building a Content Strategy

- [ ] Define content goals (traffic, leads, brand awareness)
- [ ] Identify target audience personas
- [ ] Conduct topic research (keyword clusters, audience questions)
- [ ] Create content pillars (3-5 main topics)
- [ ] Build topic clusters (pillar + supporting content)
- [ ] Plan editorial calendar (themes, publish cadence)
- [ ] Define content formats (blog, video, podcast, social)
- [ ] Set KPIs per content type
- [ ] Review and optimize monthly

## Key Frameworks

- **Content Pillars**: 3-5 core topics that align with business goals
- **Topic Clusters**: Pillar page + 8-12 cluster posts linking back
- **Content Mix**: 70% educational, 20% engagement, 10% promotional
- **Publishing Cadence**: Consistency > frequency (2-4x per week ideal)

## Quick Wins

- Start with one pillar topic, build cluster around it
- Use "People Also Ask" for cluster ideas
- Batch-create content (write 4-5 posts at once)
- Repurpose one piece into 10+ formats
